snippet.title: What are Deep Agents?
snippet.description:
Deep Agents is a term we coined to describe agents capable of handling complex, open-ended tasks over long time horizons. We identified four essential components that make this possible: a planning tool, access to a filesystem, subagents, and detailed prompts.

We built deepagents as a Python package that brings all of these pieces together. With the framework in place, all you need to provide are your custom tools and a tailored prompt. deepagents makes it easy to build your own Deep Agent from the ground up.

Docs: https://docs.langchain.com/oss/python/deepagents/overview/?utm_medium=social&utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=q4-2025_deep-agents-campaign_aw

Slides: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/10RyhGsScWhfqKk4PbYOljPiotoa8xcWNw9pAujJ0sAc/edit?usp=sharing
